Triatoma infestans.Scutellum: Scutellum black, rugose, distinct central depression.
Triatoma infestans.Setae: Setae rostrum short surface second segment.
Triatoma infestans.Spongy fossulae: Spongy fossulae fore mid tibiae males, absent females.
Triatoma infestans.Submedian carinae: Submedian carinae extending posterior hind lobe evanescent posterior margin.
Triatoma infestans.Venter: Venter convex, flattened middle, striate , setose.

Triatoma lecticularia.Abdomen: Abdomen convex male, convex flattened center female.
Triatoma lecticularia.Antenniferous: Antenniferous tubercles situated posterior anteocular region, close eyes.
Triatoma lecticularia.Antenniferous tubercles: Antenniferous tubercles situated posterior anteocular region, close eyes.
Triatoma lecticularia.Anteocular region: Anteocular region times long postocular (1:0,35), postocular sides convex, converging .
Triatoma lecticularia.Corium: Corium large central spot general color, basal subapical spots orange-yellow; outer border corium bordered light color; entire surface corium conspicuous adpressed black setae .
Triatoma lecticularia.Eyes: Eyes lateral view attaining surpassing level attaining level upper surface head.
Triatoma lecticularia.First antennal segment: First antennal segment falling short apex peus; second segment short hairs .
Triatoma lecticularia.Head: Head granulose, dark, convex eyes; twice long wide eyes (1:0,6) shorter pronotum (1:1,1-1,2).
Triatoma lecticularia.Legs: Legs hairy, dark, coxae cases lightened.
Triatoma lecticularia.Length: Length male 16-22 , female 18-23 , width pronotum male 3,7-5,5 , female 4,2-6,0 ; width abdomen male 5-8 , female 6,5-8,5 Overall color piceous, orange orange-yellow markings pronotum, pleura, corium, connexivum, ventral surface abdomen.
Triatoma lecticularia.Overall color: Overall color piceous, orange orange-yellow markings pronotum, pleura, corium, connexivum, ventral surface abdomen.
Triatoma lecticularia.Pilosity: Pilosity developed entire body including corium.
Triatoma lecticularia.Posterior lobe: Posterior lobe rugose, conspicuous dark setae entire surface; submedian carinae evanescent .
Triatoma lecticularia.Pronotum: Pronotum dark, 1+ 1 orange bands lateral margins posterior lobe, narrow , wider extending humeri; posterior margin pronotum specimens lighter colored, submedian carinae collar anterolateral processes; specimens, dark areas posterior lobe pronotum reduced wide median 1 + 1 sublateral stripes, orange color extending 1 + 1 wide lateral 1+ 1 submedian spots occupying carinae widened , confluent lateral markings.
Triatoma lecticularia.Rostrum: Rostrum hairy, second segments; segment attaining level apex antenniferous tubercle, second attaining level neck.
Triatoma lecticularia.Scutellum: Scutellum dark; central portion depressed, limited irregular carinae; apical process shorter main body scutellum, setose, tapering , apex deflected.
Triatoma lecticularia.Tibiae: Tibiae second pair male small spongy fossulae, absent female.
Triatoma lecticularia.Venter: Venter pilose, piceous orangeyellow markings level light-colored connexival markings, covering intersegmental sutures extending lateral borders urosternites; cases, entire venter tinged orange, basal half.
